properties.areaDesc: Wayne, IL; White, IL; Gallatin, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 7:49PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...

Little Wabash River at Carmi
Skillet Fork River at Wayne City

.Current and expected heavy rainfall through Saturday will continue
to cause rises on the little Wabash River at Carmi and the Skillet Fork
River at Wayne City. Major Flooding is still forecast for Wayne City
with Moderate Flooding still forecast for Carmi.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Little Wabash River at Carmi.
* from late tonight until further notice.
* At  6:30 PM Friday the stage was 23.9 feet.
* Flood Stage is 27.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by
5am Saturday morning and continue to rise near 34.6 feet by
next Friday morning, January 17th.
* Impact...At 35.5 Feet...Businesses just downstream of IL Route 14
and Route 1 in Carmi flood.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
